name: Vegan Strawberry Cheesecake
description: Recipe for 6 vegan mini strawberry cheesecakes
recipeIngredient: 1 cup cashews (soak the cashews for 4-6 hours)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the almonds into a food processor and blend until they are nicely crushed. Then add the dates and the popped quinoa and blend again until a sticky mixture forms. Press it into six silicone muffin cups.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the almonds into a food processor and blend until they are nicely crushed. Then add the dates and the popped quinoa and blend again until a sticky mixture forms. Press it into six silicone muffin cups.

recipeInstructions.text: Then make the cheesecake layer: Drain the cashews and put them together with the coconut milk in a food processor and blend until it becomes creamy and smooth. Then add the strawberries and blend for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Then make the cheesecake layer: Drain the cashews and put them together with the coconut milk in a food processor and blend until it becomes creamy and smooth. Then add the strawberries and blend for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour it evenly on the base layer and freeze for about 4-6 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour it evenly on the base layer and freeze for about 4-6 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Allow the mini cheesecakes to warm up for 30-60 minutes before you serve them.
recipeInstructions.name: Allow the mini cheesecakes to warm up for 30-60 minutes before you serve them.
